page.title: 20Clacton Carnival Queen
page.content: Each year, in conjunction with Clacton Carnival, a Queen is selected as a figurehead for the events of the week. A selection dance is held in May at Highfields Holiday Camp, and during the evening Miss Clacton is selected and crowned, along with a senior princess, a junior queen and two junior princesses. They have a long and busy summer ahead, as they visit other local Carnivals on many weekends during the season. During the Carnival week itself the queen and her court attend all the events, selling raffle tickets, drawing prizes and generally making sure that the visitors have a good time.
